user_query: My company is organizing a charity event and we need to send out promotional emails to potential donors. Can you help us create an effective email marketing campaign by providing templates and strategies? Additionally, we would like to include some healthy recipes in the emails to promote a balanced lifestyle.

TaskList.description: Gather information on effective email marketing strategies for a charity event.
Create email templates for the promotional campaign.
Research and compile a list of healthy recipes to include in the email campaign.
Integrate healthy recipes into the email templates.
Send out the promotional emails to potential donors.
